text: Manuel José de Arriaga Brum da Silveira e Peyrelongue"Anuário da Nobreza de Portugal", 1985, Tomo II (; 8 July 1840 - 5 March 1917) was a Portuguese lawyer and the first elected president of the First Portuguese Republic after overthrowing King Manuel II of Portugal. == References == Category:1840 births Category:1917 deaths Category:Portuguese politicians
title: Manuel de Arriaga
